column4: Latest;Phnom Penh: A Chinese husband and wife involved in a $ 5 million property fraud were sent to the Phnom Penh Municipal Court on March 1
column10: were arrested by police from the Criminal Division of The Interior Ministry  on Feb. 28 in Phnom Penh
column11: according to the source.------The case comes after an investor in China made a complaint that he had been defrauded by the couple over a property deal in Cambodia.------Police say the man has spent nearly $ 5 million to buy a condo Phnom Penh
column12: with a value of up to $ 30 million
column13: but claims the pair used false business practices.------The two suspects have denied involvement and pleaded for bail.------Rasmei News
